name: EncodingAll
tag_list: encoding, video, transcoding, cloud, saas, cloud-based, pay-as-you-go, encoder, transcode, speech-to-text, transcription, media
overview:
EncodingAll is a multi-format video encoding solution adapted to the needs of users who require high quality encoded formats at a competitive price and with no obligation. With EncodingAll, encode your videos whatever their size or length, with high-quality results for all connected devices.

EncodingAll is a multi-format encoding service that aims to simplify the process of video encoding while reducing costs through cloud computing. The offer is based on encoding packs, without obligation and purchase via online payment, and is now the most attractive in the market.

EncodingAll is the first cloud encoding platform to propose media transcription. The solution analyzes audio tracks and generates subtitle files and keywords in XML files. Thus, medias can be more accessible, ready for indexing, and visible by search engine.

Forty video encoding formats are already avaiable dedicated to optimizing videos on screens (Mobiles, IPTV, Web) and devices (Xbox, PSP, Zune, Blu-Ray,â€¦).
